addEndListener.description: Add a custom transition end trigger. Called with the transitioning DOM node and a done callback. Allows for more fine grained transition end logic. Note: Timeouts are still used as a fallback if provided.
addEndListener.description_zh: 添加自定义过渡结束触发器。使用转换的 DOM 节点和完成的回调调用。允许更细粒度的过渡结束逻辑。注意：如果提供超时，仍用作回退。

children.description: The content node to be collapsed.

classes.description: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.See CSS classes API below for more details.
classes.description_zh: 覆盖或扩展应用于组件的样式。有关详细信息，请参阅下面的 CSS 类 API。

collapsedSize.description: The width (horizontal) or height (vertical) of the container when collapsed.
collapsedSize.description_zh: 折叠时容器的宽度（水平）或高度（垂直）。

component.description: The component used for the root node. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.This needs to be able to hold a ref.
component.description_zh: 用于根节点的组件。使用 HTML 元素或组件的字符串。这需要能够保存一个 ref。

easing.description: The transition timing function. You may specify a single easing or a object containing enter and exit values.
easing.description_zh: 转换时序函数。您可以指定单个缓动或包含 enter 和 exit 值的对象。

in.description: If true, the component will transition in.
in.description_zh: 如果为 true，则组件将转换。

sx.description: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles.See the `sx` page for more details.
sx.description_zh: 允许定义系统覆盖以及其他 CSS 样式的系统属性。有关更多详细信息，请参阅“sx”页面。

timeout.description: The duration for the transition, in milliseconds. You may specify a single timeout for all transitions, or individually with an object.Set to 'auto' to automatically calculate transition time based on height.
timeout.description_zh: 转换的持续时间，以毫秒为单位。您可以为所有过渡指定单个超时，也可以单独指定一个对象超时。设置为“自动”可根据高度自动计算过渡时间。
timeout.type: auto| number| { appear?: number, enter?: number, exit?: number }
